p: The most representative single time series model is Autoregressive Integrated Moving Averages (ARIMA). This analyzes the time series of historical data and obtains the model with the optimal fit for predicting events that will occur in the short term [ 23] [ 24]. An ARIMA model shows time series data that is related to both sequentially lagged variables and their errors. ARIMA models have been used several times for the prediction of HFRS outbreaks [ 25, 23, 26â€“ 28], which indicates that this model is a good fit here as well for the forecasting of outbreaks.
